Access and use by Moshtown of the API and data from Last.fm are subjected to the Service Terms of the API as published in Last.fm\'s website http://www.lastfm.es/api/tos and they are periodically updated, to the Terms of Use of Last.fm\'s website published in Last.fm\'s website at http://www.last.fm/legal/terms y actualizados periódicamente y a la Política de Privacidad de Last.fm publicada en la web de Last.fm en ttp://www.last.fm/legal/terms and is periodically updated.

Thanks for installing Moshtown. Should you have any doubt, query, complaint or suggestion to make, or if you simply want to chat with the creators of Moshtown because you think they are really cool and interesting people (hey, hey, we really are!) please write to us: moshtownapp@gmail.com. We are more than happy to read your emails and we will try to answer them all (to the best of our abilities). Again, THANKS.
This product uses Spotify\'s API but it is not, in any way or manner, supported, certified or approved by Spotify. Spotify is the trademark of Spotify Group.
